text: Nguye Onenza nibe nako ukuhambahamba emhlabeni nangolwandle, de nibe sezinqanaweni, ziwize6 ngomoya oba luncedo, baze bavuye phakathi kuzo apho kude kufike umoya oyinkanyamba namaza, eze kubo macala onke, bade bacinge ukuba bagubungelekile. Babize kuAllâh benze ukholo lwabo lusulungeke kuYe Yedwa, (besithi): “Ukuba Wena Wedwa Ungasihlangula kule (meko), inene thina siya kuba ngabanombulelo.”
